CHAT.comment: at home on a wet rainy day

u.a: 13 sec as D moves around; silence , soft rustles
amused; 1 sec , then he starts to play with S
sotto voce; 8 sec rustles and bangs
encouraging S to look at his BusyBox
sotto voce; 8.5 sec: D clicks switch several times
whisper; 7.5 sec: D clicks switch several times
4.8 sec , switch clicking on and off
13.3 sec: silence , bell bongs twice , silence , one bong
21 sec: silence , soft sounds , car passes , clunks
3 sec , silence , radio , 4 sec , S murmurs soft throaty sounds
mixed with an inhale and a cough; 19 sec hollow metallic clunks; radio
13 sec; rustles , radio , S makes fussy/effort sounds
24 sec , radio; D moving around; S murmurs once
6 sec , voices outside , then S makes a gutteral sound
from raspy to loud and shrill
7.2 sec silence , clunks , S makes a small sound
92 sec: silence , feeding , voices outside , car passes , clunks and clinks
tape OFF/ON at 15:11; then they are doing sound play together
S inhales and gets more excited
50 sec; silence , feeding , clicks and rattles
21 sec feeding; outside voices; tape OFF/ON at 17:39
D is bathing S in the kitchen sink; he has a bath toy that dings
23 sec: silence , outside voices , dings , splashing
20 sec , dings , clunks , splashes , voices , slight fuss
3.3 sec , no response , just splashes and dings
long silence , dings , splash , sniff; tape OFF/ON at 21:19; still in bath , toy dinging
30 sec , water gurgling and splashing loudly , dings and bangs
11 sec , clunks and dings , tape OFF/ON at 23:00
drowned out by something crashing down
whispered; 28 sec dog barks; silence , clatter , pounding , silence , car passing , hollow thumps
trying to imitate dog ? 2.2 sec , dog barks again
4.2 sec , dog barks some more; S starts to crawl
overlapped by D echoing , same highish pitch
2.5 sec , S starts to pant anxiously
during the 2s pause , D clicks light on and off; 2 more sec , more clicks
33 sec silence , breathing , 2 small sounds , rhythmic pulsing
soft murmur; 1.2 sec , S starts to make a creaky sound , drowned out by D
26 sec silence , then S grunts and burps three times , more silence , 2 more burps
tape off in the middle of the word
